newsitem.title: USA: June global chip sales rise 7.5 percent.
newsitem.headline: June global chip sales rise 7.5 percent.

text.p: Global semiconductor sales reached $11.39 billion in June, up 7.5 percent over the $10.6 billion in sales recorded in June 1996, the Semiconductor Industry Association said Wednesday.
SIA said June global sales were up 1.6 percent from May 1997.
The largest increase from last June was in the Americas, were sales were up 14 percent to $3.83 billion. Sales in the Asia-Pacific market were up 9.3 percent to $2.45 billion, SIA said.
